_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four absorptions [sn41.8:5.19]: The first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected
The second absorption, as the placing of the mind and keeping it connected are stilled
The third absorption, with the fading away of rapture
The fourth absorption, giving up pleasure and pain
The ten legitimate questions [sn41.8:5.1: One thing: question, summary, and answer
Two things: question, summary, and answer
Three things: question, summary, and answer
Four things: question, summary, and answer
Five things: question, summary, and answer
Six things: question, summary, and answer
Seven things: question, summary, and answer
Eight things: question, summary, and answer
Nine things: question, summary, and answer
Ten things: question, summary, and answer
